channel.title: Black & Brown Radio
channel.description:
Peace and welcome to Black & Brown Radio! After the success of the Black & Brown Show on blogtalkradio.com (that's www.blogtalkradio.com/blackandbrownshow), The twin minds have taken the broadcast to a whole new level, right here on PodOmatic. Entertaining, yes, enlightening, even more so; while maintaining a supreme consistency of education. Black & Brown Radio features a mega playlist of music unheard that you wish hit the stations years ago to put an end the trash that's polluting the airwaves.
This show is unlike any other because you are getting the balance of good music and good points at a good time.
To Be In Tune, You Must Tune In
channel.itunes:subtitle: To Be In Tune, You Must Tune In
channel.itunes:author: Black & Brown Radio @ 11pm

item.title: Sun Tzu Takeover pt. 2
item.description: Sun Tzu Cadre invades the airwaves one more time with a classic Sun Tzu playlist, from your only source of Righteous Radio, for Righteous People! Sun Tzu Takeover pt. 2 1. This Place Is A Zoo - Resurrector 2. Have You Ever - Sun Tzu Cadre 3. Walk & Talk - Black & Brown 4. Muthafuckin Rite - Most High 5. Happy Everyday - Scrooge McJus 6. Civilize A Seed - Imperial 7. Dreams of My Father - M.E. feat.Imperial 8. On Ease - Arkil feat. Most High & M.E. 9. Nobody Wanna Die - Black & Brown feat. Resurrector

item.title: Black & Brown Countdown
item.description: Black & Brown Radio will analyze the top 10 songs in this 2 part show. We will look into the message, images in the video, and lyrics and breakdown these chart topping songs. Tune in to Black & Brown Radio and see what the ratings are for today's pop sensations. To be in tune, you must tune in. Peace http://www.masterequality.com

item.title: Oct. 28th - Master Equality
item.description: "Master Equality", the mixtape that started it all, is still available online for your purchase at www.masterequality.com. Go back see what began this wave of righteous music that has penetrated the minds of the masses from Cadre's Detroit headquarters to men, women, and children across the globe. This show will give you a greater understanding of Sun Tzu Cadre and the science behind Master Equality.
item.dc:creator: Black & Brown Radio @ 11pm

item.title: "Predetermined Idea" World Premiere
item.description: The "Predetermined Idea" is the long-awaited mixtape by the Black & Brown, the duo predicted by the 23 scientist in the year 1, 15,095 years ago to bring forth this project. You will hear, for the first time, exclusive releases from the mixtape; and wont hear them again until 11.03.09 when it drops on http://www.masterequality.com Dont miss this opportunity to be the first to hear the "Predetermined Idea" right here on Podomatic.com You Must Tune In To Be In Tune

item.title: The "Predetermined Idea" Commercial
item.description: The Black & Brown shines as a binary star with a diverse background; which is what ultimately excels the content of the music far beyond the average, monotonous sound that is force fed to the vast majority. The Black seed (M.E.) and the Brown seed (Imperial) are sure to enlighten, entertain, and educate you from one song to the next. Tune in Oct. 24th for the debut of the Black & Brown Radio. This duo was created out of the Detroit based phenom, Sun Tzu Cadre.Sneak The Prediction is near..........
